game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact in the dungeon.
game.description: Rumors say that the lost artifact is hidden deep within the forgotten dungeon. Retrieve it to bring honor to our guild.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a legendary sword

task.description: Make your way through the dense forest to locate the entrance of the dungeon.
A powerful golem guards the artifact. You must defeat it to proceed.
